Red-Piranha - Java Power tools for Excel

Red-Piranha is a set of Power tools for Excel and Office Power users.

It packages the Drools Business Rules Management System (BRMS) solution from RedHat (IBM) to be more accessible to Windows Desktop users. In particular, it makes it easier to feed information from Excel and Word (Office) Documents, apply business rules to these documents, and get useful results.

Most importantly, because your business rules are in an 'English like' language, it makes it very easy for you (and colleagues) to see what checks are being made.

Packages 
Package Description
net.firstpartners
Classes to interact with the JBoss Drools Business Rules system
net.firstpartners.core
Key Classes used Across Red-Piranha, regardless of GUI
net.firstpartners.core.drools
Classes for interacting with the JBoss Drools Business Rules Management system
net.firstpartners.core.drools.loader
Classes for reading rules from storage
net.firstpartners.core.excel
Classes to interact with spreadsheets like Excel (converting to and from our own more simple JavaBean format in net.firstpartners.data
net.firstpartners.core.file
Classes to interact with Non Office file formats like CSV and PDF
net.firstpartners.core.log
Classes to supporting Logging - both to users, and for system
net.firstpartners.core.word
Classes to interact with DocumentHolder like Word (converting to and from our own more simple JavaBean format in net.firstpartners.data
net.firstpartners.data
Classes to hold Table Data Terminology is similar to MS Excel - Ranges (named groups of Cells) and Cells.
net.firstpartners.ui
Classes to interact with the user
net.firstpartners.ui.component
Sub components supporting the main UI Interfaces
net.firstpartners.ui.utils
Utilities supporting the user interface
